open.title: Vuma Village outage | Gauteng
open.description: Vuma Village has informed us of a network outage affecting Gauteng, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Vuma Village engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content:
Areas affected include:
Midrand
Wesbury
Swartkop
Johanessburg
Samrand

open.description: MetroFibre has informed us of a network outage affecting Raceway, affected clients will experience no connectivity. MetroFibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: Fibre repairs are on-going, affected clients may experience intermittent connectivity. MetroFibre's current estimated time for completion is 31/07/2023 at 17:00. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

The following areas are affected.

Albermarle
Castleview
Dinwiddie
Elandshaven
Elandspark
Florentia
Germiston
Gosforth park
Linmeyer
South Crest
The Hills
Verwoerdpark
Union Free Standing Houses
